title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, April 22, 2020
description: The first Earth Day was celebrated on this day 50 years ago, prompting the U.S. government to form the Environmental Protection Agency and pass major environmental acts.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: The first Earth Day was celebrated on this day 50 years ago, prompting the U.S. government to form the Environmental Protection Agency and pass major environmental acts.
itunes:summary: The first Earth Day was celebrated on this day 50 years ago, prompting the U.S. government to form the Environmental Protection Agency and pass major environmental acts.
